name: Afya Ray Wellness
tagline: Natural Photo/Light Therapy for Holistic Healing
description: Advanced photo and light therapy treatments that stimulate your body's natural healing processes. Proven results for various health conditions using non-invasive, natural methods.

contact.address: CK Building, next to Total Petrol Station, Ongata Rongai

services.name: Cysts Treatment
services.description: Light therapy reduces inflammation and promotes natural cyst dissolution through targeted cellular regeneration.

services.name: Heart Conditions
services.description: Improves circulation and supports cardiovascular health by enhancing cellular oxygen uptake and blood flow.

services.name: Numbness & Nerve Issues
services.description: Stimulates nerve regeneration and improves neural pathways to restore sensation and function.

services.name: Diabetes Management
services.description: Enhances cellular glucose metabolism and improves insulin sensitivity through photobiomodulation.

services.name: Hypertension
services.description: Promotes vasodilation and improves blood vessel elasticity to naturally lower blood pressure.

services.name: Body Pain Relief
services.description: Reduces inflammation and triggers endorphin release for natural, long-lasting pain management.

services.name: Anti-Aging Therapy
services.description: Stimulates collagen production and cellular renewal to reduce signs of aging and improve skin health.

services.name: Arthritis Treatment
services.description: Reduces joint inflammation and promotes cartilage repair for improved mobility and pain relief.

services.name: Fibroids Treatment
services.description: Promotes hormonal balance and reduces fibroid size through targeted light therapy protocols.

services.name: Body Composition Analysis
services.description: Comprehensive assessment of muscle mass, fat percentage, and metabolic health with personalized recommendations.

services.name: Nutritional Supplements
services.description: Targeted supplement protocols to support your healing journey and optimize treatment results.
